sentences.en: And actually it damages the pancreas itself, after a while.
sentences.cn: 事实上，一段时间之后它对胰腺本身也会产生伤害。

sentences.en: Another possible way to control juvenile - onset diabetes is the pancreas transplant.
sentences.cn: 控制少年期糖尿病的另一种可行的方法是胰腺移植.

sentences.en: Duodenun is joined to the liver and to the pancreas by ducts.
sentences.cn: 十二指肠通过导管与肝和胰相连.

sentences.en: During left LPN , the spleen, splenic flexure and pancreas are reflected medially.
sentences.cn: 在左侧LPN中, 脾脏, 结肠脾曲以及胰腺应使其倒向内侧.

sentences.en: High fat content usually indicates disease of the pancreas or small intestine.
sentences.cn: 粪便中过量的脂类通常表示胰线或小肠病变.

sentences.en: I am tired of all this nonsense of beauty being only skin deep. that's deep enough. What do you want—an adorable pancreas?
sentences.cn: 我厌倦了一切所谓“美只是肤浅的”的胡说八道。它已经够深刻的了。你究竟想要什么—一个值得崇拜的胰腺？

sentences.en: In one major form , juvenile - onset dia - betes , the pancreas supplies little , if any, insulin.
sentences.cn: 有一大类是青年发病型糖尿病, 胰腺分泌极少的(或不分泌)胰岛素.

sentences.en: In people with diabetes, however, the pancreas either produces little or no insulin, or the cells do not respond appropriately to the insulin that is produced.
sentences.cn: 然而，有糖尿病的人，胰腺要么生成一点或根本没有生成胰岛素，或者是细胞没有正确的反应胰腺分泌的胰岛素。

sentences.en: Insulin is secreted by beta cells, specialized cells in the pancreas.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素是由胰腺中的特种细胞β细胞分泌的.

sentences.en: Insulin is secreted by special cells in the pancreas when a person eats.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素是在人进食时胰腺的一种特殊细胞分泌的.

sentences.en: Insulin is secreted by the pancreas.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素是胰腺分泌的。

sentences.en: Intestinal bacterial translocation is the prime source of pancreas infection.
sentences.cn: 胰腺感染细菌的来源主要是肠道细菌的移位.

sentences.en: Most cells of the pancreas produce digestive enzymes.
sentences.cn: 胰腺的大部分细胞产生酶.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe organic chromium protection in the diabetic rat pancreas.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察有机铬对实验性糖尿病大鼠胰腺的保护作用.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the advantages of various imaging diagnostic cancer of pancreas.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨胰腺癌各种影像学诊断的优势互补.

sentences.en: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of primitive neuroectodermal tumors (PNET) of the pancreas.
sentences.cn: 目的提高对胰腺原始神经外胚叶肿瘤（PNET）诊断和治疗的认识。

sentences.en: The scientists claim the rat stem cells grew in the niche left by the absent mouse pancreas and so almost any organ could be produced in this way.
sentences.cn: 科学家们声称大鼠干细胞刚好在小白鼠缺失的胰腺所在位置生长，所以几乎任何器官都可以通过这种方法生成。

sentences.en: The starch - digesting amylase produced by the pancreas and present in pancreatic juice.
sentences.cn: 小肠内产生的助消化的荷尔蒙;刺激胰腺和肝脏.

sentences.en: There are about 1.5 million islets is the pancreas.
sentences.cn: 胰腺里大约有一百五十万个胰岛.

sentences.en: This is caused by the destruction of insulin - producing cells in the pancreas.
sentences.cn: 型糖尿病是由于胰腺中的胰岛素细胞被破坏而引发的.

sentences.en: Tuberous sclerosis can lead to the formation of fibroids or tumors in the pancreas, bone, and liver.
sentences.cn: 结节性硬化症可以导致患者的胰腺、骨骼和肝脏发生纤维瘤或其他肿瘤。

trans.tran_en: a  gland  inside your body, near your stomach, that produces  insulin  and a liquid that helps your body to use the food that you eat
